phrases.phrase: And you were told right. So you are trying to get out from here. I'm curious why.
Why the attitude? I'm sure we'll get along. I'm the 3rd Guardian of this land. So I can help you get out. But then again, why would you want to leave?
Sure, but you need to solve a solve a math problem first...
Oh, incorrect. Let's try a different one.
Just kidding. You passed. Go see my last brother.

player-answers.answer: Hi, 3rd Guardian. I was told that's who you are.
Because I would like to go home, this place is very odd.
That's none of you business. This place strange and I want out.
You guys tell me to do math now??
Seriously, what's wrong with you people...
